You’ve completed [gamipress_user_points type="inside-man-workout" thumbnail="yes" label="yes" current_user="yes" inline="yes" columns="1" columns_small="1" layout="top" align="center" wpms="no"]
column4: Awarded to players who put in the work to develop elite skills in catching and finishing around the crease, showing slick hands and quick decision-making. Whether you're in traffic or under pressure, you consistently find ways to score from close range.
column45: Congrats, Inside Man! Your ability to handle the heat and finish in tight spaces makes you a dangerous threat on the crease. Keep working those slick skills, and you’ll always be the go-to player when the team needs a goal

column3:
Middie Machine Badge

The highest achievement for mastering every aspect of being a midfielder—defense, transition, dodging, shooting, and leading clears. Unlocked by achieving the Long Range Sharp Shooter, Dodging Dynamo, and Inside Man Achievements.
column4: The highest achievement for mastering every aspect of being a midfielder—defense, transition, dodging, shooting, and leading clears. Unlocked by achieving the Long Range Sharp Shooter, Dodging Dynamo, and Inside Man Achievements.
column45: Fantastic work, Middie Machine! You’ve mastered every aspect of being a midfielder. Whether it's offense, defense, or transition, you are the engine that keeps the game moving. Keep dominating the field!
